law.catch_line: Appropriation of funds other than taxes.
law.text: The board of aldermen of a city of the first class having a municipal university may devote to university purposes funds derived from other sources as well as from taxes levied for general city purposes.
law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4948a-4.
